attributes.action: ask for the resignation of Mark Thompson (BBC Director-General)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the impartiality of the BBC towards the conflicts in the middle east is comprimised with Mark Thompson holding the position of BBC Director-General. This allegation is based on his personal visit to Israel to "bridge ties" with the BBC and Israel and also the BBC's managerial decision not to broadcast the gaza DEC (Diasasters Emergency Committee) appeal.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
